name: wporg-gutenberg-project
description: The codebase and development environment for w.org/gutenberg.
author: WordPress.org

scripts.initial-setup: composer install && yarn && yarn run update-configs
scripts.env:setup: wp-env start --update && yarn run env:reset && yarn run env:misc
scripts.env:reset: wp-env clean all && wp-env run cli "wp site empty --yes"
